entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 41. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 38. POP 30%

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 40. POP 30%
